item.author: Elizabeth Blair
item.description: A Danish museum has agreed to return the bronze head of a Roman Emperor to Turkey. The sculpture was among thousands of artifacts looted from Turkey and sold to American and European museums. (This story first aired on All Things Considered on Dec. 3, 2024.)
item.itunes:author: Elizabeth Blair
item.itunes:subtitle: A Danish museum agrees to return a bronze sculpture looted from Turkey
item.itunes:summary: A Danish museum has agreed to return the bronze head of a Roman Emperor to Turkey. The sculpture was among thousands of artifacts looted from Turkey and sold to American and European museums. (This story first aired on All Things Considered on Dec. 3, 2024.)

item.title: A Danish museum agrees to return a bronze sculpture looted from Turkey

item.itunes:title: It's Spirit Halloween season. How does the retailer stay afloat year-round?
item.title: It's Spirit Halloween season. How does the retailer stay afloat year-round?
